path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/QuillAudits/Kresus NFT Smart Contract Audit Report - QuillAudits.pdf

findings.title: Anyone can burn tokens
findings.description: The functions burn() and burnBatchToken() in KresusNFT.sol are unprotected, allowing anyone to call these functions directly on KresusNFT passing in the Proxy address, ids of assets held by proxy and burn the token(s) held by Proxy.

findings.title: Centralization Risks / Overpowered Ownership
findings.description: Admins can perform privileged activities with centralised control to mint, burn, migrate and update Kresus NFT contract.

findings.title: Input array lengths not all checked for length equality
findings.description: The function does not check if `_assetIds`, `_tokenURIs` and `_amounts` have equal lengths, which can lead to inconsistent data processing.
